definitions.definition: Occurring or appearing irregularly from time to time, but not often ; incidental .
examples: He was mostly solitary, but enjoyed the occasional visitor.
He took an occasional glass of wine.
Elgar's music was not created to be occasional music for high-school graduations.

definitions.definition: Intended for use as the occasion requires.
examples: What your living room needs are some occasional chairs.

definitions.definition: Acting in the indicated role from time to time.
examples: He is an occasional writer of letters to the editor.

main_definition: Occurring or appearing irregularly from time to time, but not often ; incidental .
secondary_definitions: Intended for use as the occasion requires.
Acting in the indicated role from time to time.
